TABLE.NAME: local_shopping_cart_ledger
TABLE.COMMENT: This ledger only supports insert and works as a reliable record of all payments.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the user who bought the item.

FIELD.NAME: itemid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the bought item.

FIELD.NAME: itemname
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the item bought

FIELD.NAME: price
FIELD.COMMENT: The actually paid price of the item (discount is substracted). Negative values normally appear for cancelation and cashback.

FIELD.NAME: tax
FIELD.COMMENT: Tax applied to this item $price as an absolute value in $currency. Price can be net or gross!

FIELD.NAME: taxpercentage
FIELD.COMMENT: Tax applied to this item price in percent float (20% tax = 0.2 float value).

FIELD.NAME: taxcategory
FIELD.COMMENT: Tax category defined for this item.

FIELD.NAME: discount
FIELD.COMMENT: Given discount in absolute amount. If 10% is given on 19, the value here will be 1.9.

FIELD.NAME: credits
FIELD.COMMENT: Credits used for payment. Negativ credits are given to a user, normally in exchange for cancelation.

FIELD.NAME: fee
FIELD.COMMENT: Fees are only saved during cancelation, when price goes back to the user, but a cancelation fee is kept.

FIELD.NAME: currency
FIELD.COMMENT: Currency which was used to pay this item.

FIELD.NAME: componentname
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the component which provided the item, like mod_booking.

FIELD.NAME: costcenter
FIELD.COMMENT: The cost center of the bought item if provided by the item plugin.

FIELD.NAME: identifier
FIELD.COMMENT: The identifier is used during checkout to identify a whole cart. Many items can be bought with the same identifier.

FIELD.NAME: payment
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of payment.

FIELD.NAME: paymentstatus
FIELD.COMMENT: Was the transaction successful or not?

FIELD.NAME: accountid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the moodle payment account used.

FIELD.NAME: usermodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Which user actually effectuated the transaction (might have been cashier)

FIELD.NAME: area
FIELD.COMMENT: One component can provide different areas with independent ids.

FIELD.NAME: annotation
FIELD.COMMENT: Annotation or OrderID.

FIELD.NAME: schistoryid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the corresponding shopping cart history entry.
